REUTERS.UNKNOWN: C G f0444 reute u f BC-U.K.-INTERVENTION-FEE 04-01 0073

TEXT.TITLE: U.K. INTERVENTION FEED WHEAT SOLD TO HOME MARKET
TEXT.BODY: A total of 126,031 tonnes of U.K. Intervention feed wheat was sold to the home market at this week's tender, provisional results show, the Home Grown Cereals Authority (HGCA), said. Actual prices were not reported but the wheat was sold at, or above, the March intervention price of 119.17 stg per tonne. Grain traders sought to buy about 340,000 tonnes. REUTER
